other_tests.changes_over_time: Two years later, cervical lymphadenopathy recurred, and a lymph-node biopsy was diagnostic of a T-cellâ€“rich, histiocyte-rich, diffuse large-B-cell lymphoma.

other_tests.findings: Increased accumulation of double-negative (CD3+CD4-CD8-) T cells (32 percent of all CD3+ T cells).

other_tests.procedure_name: Genetic Sequencing of the Fas Gene
other_tests.findings: Point mutation in intron 7 affecting a canonical splicing site, causing the skipping of exon 7 and a frame shift.

other_tests.procedure_name: Genetic Sequencing of the Perforin Gene
other_tests.findings: Point mutation in exon 3 (755A>G), change from asparagine to serine (N252S).
Natural killer activity assessed against K562 cell line revealed normal intracellular levels of perforin.
